name: Prone Scapular Retraction - Arms at Side
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your stomach with arms extended to the sides and legs straight.

2. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine, ensuring that your lower back stays flat throughout the exercise.

3. Take a deep breath in and as you exhale, slowly lower your shoulders down and back, keeping your chest lifted and your elbows slightly bent.

4. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and maintaining control throughout the movement.

5. Hold for a brief moment before slowly returning to the starting position.

6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions and sets.
short_summary: Prone scapular retraction with arms at side targets the scapular muscles, improving posture and mobility in the shoulders
